author: Anonymous Scale
title: Problem 4 L02
question:
I am having trouble with solving problem 4 of today's class (201) 
 It produces the following error 
(@htdf image>)
(@signature Image Image -> Boolean)
;Compare two images area and produce a boolean
(check-expect (Image> (rectangle 30 50 "solid" "blue") (rectangle 30 30 "solid" "blue")) true)
(check-expect (Image> (rectangle 30 20 "solid" "blue") (rectangle 30 30 "solid" "blue")) false)
(check-expect (Image> (rectangle 30 30 "solid" "blue") (rectangle 30 30 "solid" "blue")) false)


;(define (image> img1 img2) false) ;stub


(@template Image)

(define (image> img1 img2)
  (if (> (* (image-width img1)(image-height img1))(* (image-width img2) (image-height img2)))
      true
      false
      ))



Ran 10 tests.
3 of the 10 tests failed.

Check failures:
        check-expect encountered the following error instead of the expected value, true. 
   :: Image>: this function is not defined
in m01-htdf-starter.rkt, line 106, column 0 caused by expression in m01-htdf-starter.rkt, line 106, column 15
        check-expect encountered the following error instead of the expected value, false. 
   :: Image>: this function is not defined
in m01-htdf-starter.rkt, line 107, column 0 caused by expression in m01-htdf-starter.rkt, line 107, column 15
        check-expect encountered the following error instead of the expected value, false. 
   :: Image>: this function is not defined
in m01-htdf-starter.rkt, line 108, column 0 caused by expression in m01-htdf-starter.rkt, line 108, column 15
instructor_answer:
Thank you for updating your post as per @6.
If you look at the error, it states the following:
Image>: this function is not defined
That’s because the function that you’re calling in your check-expects, Image>, is different from the function you defined; image>. It’s a subtle difference and a common mistake.
If errors pop up like this, it’s good to take a look at your function definition and debug from there.
